item.title: Costco

item.description:
This is one of our cheaper meals in that one hotdog, two slices of pizza, a berry smoothie and a soda brought us to a grand total of $7 and some change. And where, might you ask, could you get such delicious looking delicacies on a friday around noon? The simple answer would be Cosco. […]

item.content:encoded:
This is one of our cheaper meals in that one hotdog, two slices of pizza, a berry smoothie and a soda brought us to a grand total of $7 and some change. And where, might you ask, could you get such delicious looking delicacies on a friday around noon? The simple answer would be Cosco. Cosco may be known for their large quantities of meat, produce, and utensils, but you canâ€™t beat their delicious pizza and hot dogs. As you can see from the picture, the food is ginormous! Cosco pizza is definitely one of my guilty pleasures in life.

The post Costco appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
